Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso, as I investigated him last night. His denial is just a desperate bluff to survive. We need to vote him out now."

You: "This is a lot to take in. Charlie claims he's the detective and Bob is the mafia. Bob claims Charlie is lying. We have no way to verify Charlie's claim directly. If Charlie is telling the truth, we must vote for Bob. If Charlie..."

Charlie was arrested
